Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.network

Class ClientSocketConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.network.ClientSocketConnection
public class ClientSocketConnection
extends java.lang.Object
Client Socket Connection Class, manages the creation of the socket and connection to the ip and port of the server

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ClientSocketConnection​(ClientController clientController)
    Create new clientSocket ClientController is one instance in all the application, so is created in main class and passed

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getServerName()  
    int getServerPort()  
    boolean isSocketClosed()
    Check if the Socket with the server is closed
    boolean setServerName​(java.lang.String serverName)
    Set serverName and validate
    void setServerPort​(int serverPort)
    Set the server port, if 0-1023 or invalid TCP port: the default port is chosen (is in variables)
    boolean startConnection()
    Start Client Connection with socket to the server

    • startConnection

      public boolean startConnection()
      Start Client Connection with socket to the server
      Returns:
      Boolean, true if connection is established

    • isSocketClosed

      public boolean isSocketClosed()
      Check if the Socket with the server is closed
      Returns:
      Boolean, true if socket is closed

      public boolean setServerName​(java.lang.String serverName)
      Set serverName and validate
      Parameters:
      serverName - String that represent hostname
      Returns:
      true if syntax is correct

    • setServerPort

      public void setServerPort​(int serverPort)
      Set the server port, if 0-1023 or invalid TCP port: the default port is chosen (is in variables)
      Parameters:
      serverPort - integer representing the port
